dstm2.factory.ofree.invisible

Class Locator

  • java.lang.Object
    • dstm2.factory.ofree.invisible.Locator

  • public class Locator
extends java.lang.Object
    A locator points to an old version, a new version, and transactional bookkeeping information. A transaction opens an object by creating and installing a new locator.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Copyable newVersion
      Newer version of object.
      Copyable oldVersion
      Prior version of object.
      Transaction writer
      Transaction that last opened this object for writing.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Locator()
      Creates a new instance of Locator
      Locator(Transaction me, Copyable version)
      Open object for writing.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Copyable fastPath(Transaction me)
      Checks whether object is alread opened (for writing).
      Copyable getVersion(Transaction me, ContentionManager manager) 
      Copyable snapshot(Transaction me, ContentionManager manager) 
      void writePath(Transaction me, ContentionManager manager, Locator newLocator)
      Prepare a new locator to be used to open object for writing.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • writer

        public final Transaction writer
        Transaction that last opened this object for writing.

      • oldVersion

        public volatile Copyable oldVersion
        Prior version of object. Meaningless if last writer committed.

      • newVersion

        public volatile Copyable newVersion
        Newer version of object. Tentative it writer is active, meaningless if writer is aborted, and otherwise the current value.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Locator

        public Locator()
        Creates a new instance of Locator
        Parameters:
        version - Current version of object.

      • Locator

        public Locator(Transaction me,
       Copyable version)
        Open object for writing.
        Parameters:
        me - Calling transaction.
        version - Version to be modified.

    • Method Detail

      • fastPath

        public Copyable fastPath(Transaction me)
        Checks whether object is alread opened (for writing).
        Parameters:
        me - calling transaction
        Returns:
        Returns version if already open, null otherwise.

      • getVersion

        public Copyable getVersion(Transaction me,
                  ContentionManager manager)

      • writePath

        public void writePath(Transaction me,
             ContentionManager manager,
             Locator newLocator)
        Prepare a new locator to be used to open object for writing.
        Parameters:
        me - caller
        manager - caller's contention manager
        newLocator - locator to prepare
